text: Alchevsk () is a city in the Luhansk Oblast of south-eastern Ukraine. Alchevsk is one of the largest industrial centers in the Donbas, and comprises a quarter of the oblast's entire production. The city economy depends on OJSC "Alchevsk Iron & Steel Works" and "Alchevsk Coke-Chemical Plant" companies. The city was known as Voroshilovsk () from 1931 to 1961, and then Kommunarsk () until 1992. Category:Cities in Luhansk Oblast
title: Alchevsk
